params.caller: Address for which the whitelist should be checked

returns._0: Whether the address is trusted or not

isTrusted(address).notice: Checks whether an address is whitelisted during oracle updates

toggleTrusted(address).notice: Adds or removes a trusted keeper bot

trusted(address).notice: Trusted EOAs - needs to be tx.origin

userdoc.notice: Maintains a mapping of keepers authorized to use the core module just after oracle updates
